column4: I'm trying to config my internet on ubuntu, i'm not able. I have a cable modem plug to my ethernet card. I do : Sudo ifconfig eth0 down; dhclient eth0; ifconfig eth0 up . and its written that permission is denied ....
It worked once, but i had to reconfig. and didnt work anymore?
you should be using "ifup" and "ifdown" first of all. and you need to be root, so use sudo.
